name: Mars Landing Simulator 2014
description:
This extremely refined Mars landing simulator drops you directly into the cockpit of a high-tech landing capsule.  Unfortunately, you - the pilot - have developed total amnesia during your atmospheric entry and have no idea what the controls are.  Try your luck at landing successfully!

Pro-Tip: Use your letter keys to ensure mission success!

Created at the 1st Annual Indie Galactic Game Jam by:

Travis Fort

Alex Batty

Logan Belosser

Randy Rodriguez

Matt Carlton

Shelly Welch
